response.original_title: Dan Clark: Family Values - Timeless Truths
response.overview: Dan Clarkâ€™s empathetic understanding of resiliency and the power of the human spirit come from personal dealings, and by sharing his experiences he will move you in a way where you can never be the same. He is a New York Times Best Selling Author; a Hall of Fame Professional Speaker; a University Professor; an Extreme Adventurer; a Gold Record Songwriter; an Award Winning Athlete; and 2012 Utah Father of the Year.  His is a mission of inspiring everyone to live a magnificent life of meaningful significance.
response.title: Dan Clark: Family Values - Timeless Truths
